QuestData.Title: Experimental Instability
QuestData.Description: In order to advance our studies I must ask you to recover a few particular items from my long-forgotten chambers.$B$BI assure you it is... mostly safe there, aside from a few unstable elements.$B$BMake your way to my workshop and locate the teleporter. I'll disable its cloaking device when you arrive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather the Telemancy Notes and $3oa Discarded Orbs from Oculeth's Test Chamber.
QuestData.CompletionText: Scavenging going well? Not too dangerous I hope.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful! Now the fun begins. You should speak with Thalyssra, I believe she is ready for more... testing.

Objectives.Objective: Take the Portal to Oculeth's Test Chamber
